title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the President's Call with Governors Jindal, Barbour, Riley, and Crist | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 24, 2010

 



Statement from the Press Secretary on the President's Call with Governors Jindal, Barbour, Riley, and Crist




The President reiterated the Administrationâ€™s sense of urgency for dealing with the oil spill, assured the governors that the federal government is bringing the best science and expertise to the table and underscored his commitment to continuing our strong collaboration with the state and local governments. Department of Homeland Security Secretary Napolitano, Rear Admiral Neffinger, EPA Administrator Jackson and Commerce Department Principal Deputy Under Secretary for Oceans and Atmosphere Monica Medina provided the regular daily briefing on operations, leak stabilization, environmental impact and oil trajectories.
A photograph of the President during this call is available HERE
